page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT IN CULMSTOCK
page.content:
FARMING is the main employment with the farmer and his family being fully employed. FARMHOUSE HOLIDAYS are popular and the farmer's wife provides for the TOURIST.
Other inhabitants commute to work at: 1) The Government Radio Communications Centre at CULMHEAD, 2) Milk Factory at HEMYOCK, 3) Poultry Processing Department of Lloyd Maunder at TIVERTON JUNCTION or Shops, Offices and Banks in WELLINGTON, TAUNTON and EXETER. It is important to have one's own car as public transport is limited although some establishments provide a 'Workers' Bus'. Many are therefore two-car families.
